title: Challenge 5: Buzzer
description: Make the buzzer play a melody.
codeSolution:
import time
from machine import Pin, PWM

buzzer = PWM(Pin(5))
buzzer.freq(1000)

notes = [262, 294, 330, 349, 392, 440, 494, 523]

for note in notes:
    buzzer.duty(512)
    buzzer.freq(note)
    time.sleep(0.5)

buzzer.duty(0)
